alert.note: Alert for Gallia; Lawrence (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Gallia, southeastern Lawrence and north central Cabell Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 524 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Lake Vesuvius, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aid, Crown City, Green Bottom and Scottown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
